markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Tournaments of the Great Beyond](/Articles.aspx?ID=43)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 66

Glory on the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) is only the first step. Elsewhere, fallen angels fight for freedom and fiends test their champions in incredible otherworldly arenas.
name: Tournaments of the Great Beyond
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 66
